text:
"In the post-pandemic world, policymakers have the opportunity to adopt a series of measures that will value properly the essential work that these staff do and ensure that our nation’s #nursinghomes remain safe for older adults in the next crisis." -David Grabowski

POLITICO.COM
Opinion | Nursing homes need fixing. Here’s where to start.
